message: Let's start fair, I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can negotiate from there if you want to keep playing.
Let's meet in the middle, 60% for me and 40% for you.
I'm willing to come down a bit, but I'm not comfortable with 40%.  Let's split it 55/45.  If you reject this, we're getting closer to nothing.
I'll meet you at 55%, but I get the bigger share this time.
